name: Deckbuild Arena
description:
In Deckbuild Arena you fight increasingly difficult waves of monsters, using a deck of cards to orchestrate your attack, so things don't always go to plan! Fight enemies, collect cards and upgrade your deck to see how many waves you can survive for.

This game was developed for Godot Wild Jam #31, using the wildcard to Ignore the jam theme completely.

I am very open to feedback - please let me know what could make the game better. The logic for managing the deck, playing the cards and turn-taking took most of the time for this jam, so a lot more work could be done on content, graphics and sound effects for sure.  

Controls:

Use the mouse to select cards and aim attacks

Spacebar will give you an overview of the whole arena
